name: @rhinolabs/ui-toolkit
description: An open-source collection of frontend libraries for eliminating repetitive boilerplate in UI development

scripts.build: cd packages/hooks && bun run build && cd ../ui && bun run build && cd ../docs && bun run build
scripts.lint: cd packages/ui && bun run lint && cd ../hooks && bun run lint && cd ../docs && bun run lint
scripts.lint:fix: cd packages/ui && bun run lint:fix && cd ../hooks && bun run lint:fix && cd ../docs && bun run lint:fix
